channel.title: Comments on: 2011 Quarter 1 Goal Review
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Becky
item.dc:creator: Becky
item.content:encoded:
Wow, that’s a blistering pace and excellent set of goals for the first 6 months of a new job and encourages me to set some challenging goals myself this year! Keep up the momentum, and thanks for all you do in the community!

Becky

item.title: By: Brian Davis
item.dc:creator: Brian Davis
item.description: You're doing an amazing job and the SQL community is lucky to have you!
item.content:encoded: You’re doing an amazing job and the SQL community is lucky to have you!

item.title: By: David Taylor
item.dc:creator: David Taylor
item.description: Jes, you are an inspiration! I know you get told that every day, and we all know it's true! Thanks for all you do, thanks for making me think about where I am or where I'm going. All I can really day is "You go, girl!"
item.content:encoded: Jes, you are an inspiration! I know you get told that every day, and we all know it’s true! Thanks for all you do, thanks for making me think about where I am or where I’m going. All I can really day is “You go, girl!”
